head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GLAZER, HYMAN HARRY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GLAZER, HYMAN HARRY

block.p: GLAZER-Hyman Harry. Gently passed away in Delray Beach, FL. Loyal husband to Ida, proud father of Drs. Ilsa & Miriyam Glazer, Alyne Bat Haim & Phyllis Glazer, dear Zaydie to six, loving brother of Minnie Krassner. Owner of S&H Glazer Bros., Brooklyn. In our hearts, lives and stories always. Service Wednesday, September 13, 12:30 PM, Riverside Chapel, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, LI. Shiva through Friday at the home of Ilsa in Rockaway Beach.
